entry.def: If you describe someone or something as enchanting, you mean that they are very attractive or charming.

example.tran: 她是个非常讨人喜欢的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. capturing interest as if by a spell;

auth_sentence.content: It is swirling, complex and frequently enchanting.
